dashboard.description: Monitors Kubernetes cluster CPU AND Memory

panels.description: This table shows the comparison of CPU and RAM requests by applications, vs the capacity of the node

targets.expr:
# CPU Usage / cpu requested
sum by (namespace) (
  # Filter out no-longer-existing pods
  label_replace(
    (kube_pod_status_phase{namespace=~".*wiremind.*", phase="Running"}),
    "pod_name","$1","pod","(.*)"
  )
  * on (pod_name, namespace) group_right
  rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{image!="",container_name!="POD"}[1d])
)

/ on (namespace)
sum by (namespace) (
  kube_pod_container_resource_requests_cpu_cores
) * 100

panels.title: Cluster Node Utilisation by CPU and RAM requests

dashboard.title: Kubernetes cluster namespace utilisation
